title: Person of Interest | John Reese - Hurt
author: Real Scorsese
comment: after all these years, it still hurts ...

Reese was living on borrowed time...from when he escaped death in Ordos, to Harold preventing his suicide by giving him his first number to save to Carter taking a bullet or bullets meant for him.  So it wasn't much of stretch for him to be UP on the roof in place of Finch. Finch still had Grace to "go back" to. John had no one!
There's so much MORE story to be told by music video.   Please....more.....
description:
My last montage for the series 'Person of Interest'
Thank you Chris Fisher for the sharing in Twitter ! :)

Song : Johnny Cash - Hurt
Created by me
Software : Sony Vegas Pro 13
